patterns: How do I apply for admission
responses: Admissions info is at https://college.example.edu/admissions. Deadlines: Fall - Aug 15, Spring - Jan 10. Need more details?
Tuition depends on your program. For undergrad it's approx â‚¹X per year. Check finance office or this page: /fees
Timetables are released on the student portal 2 weeks before semester. Login to portal -> Timetable.
Library is open Mon-Sat 8 AM to 8 PM. Online resources: https://college.example.edu/library. You can borrow up to 5 books at a time.
Exam schedules are posted on the student portal. Make sure you register for exams before the deadlines.
Hostel applications are open till Aug 1. Rooms assigned on first-come-first-serve basis. Check portal -> Hostel for details.
College buses run from 7 AM to 10 PM. Routes and timings: https://college.example.edu/transport.
Scholarships info and application: https://college.example.edu/scholarships. Check deadlines carefully!
For IT issues, contact support@college.example.edu or call +91-123-456-7890. Portal login help: https://college.example.edu/it-support
Check the college events calendar here: https://college.example.edu/events. New workshops and seminars are updated regularly.
College administration contacts: https://college.example.edu/contacts. You can find emails and phone numbers for departments and faculty.
